Card

    • Uses of Card in <Unnamed>

      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Card 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Card PokerHand.getCard​(int index)
      Returns a specific card in the hand based on its index
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void PokerHand.addCard​(Card cardToAdd)
      Adds a new card to the hand
      int Card.compareTo​(Card other)
      Compares the rank of this card and that of the parameter
      static int DealerHand.indexOf​(Card[] array, int value)
      Finds the index of a card in a array of cards pre: The card array is not empty and the the value is acceptable value for a card (within the range of 1-6) post: Returns the index of that card, if card was not found in the deck it returns a value of -1
